name: St. Cyril of Alexandria
summary: Cyril of Alexandria was a bishop and theologian who played a central role in the Council of Ephesus (431), where he defended the title 'Theotokos' (God-bearer) for the Virgin Mary and opposed Nestorianism. He is considered a Doctor of the Church and is known for his extensive theological writings.
keyQuotes: I have been accustomed to pay reverence to the holy Fathers, and to follow them in all things.

writings.title: Commentary on the Gospel of John
